uni.bielefeld.cmg.sparkhit.util

Class HelpParam

  • java.lang.Object
    • uni.bielefeld.cmg.sparkhit.util.HelpParam

  • public class HelpParam
extends java.lang.Object
    Returns an object for dumping help information to the screen.
